No stairway was found within {tokenName}'s reach or is locked

Stairway not within {tokenName}'s reach or is locked

No journal was found within {tokenName}'s reach or is locked
foundryvtt-arms-reach.journalsNotInReach: Journal not in reach or is locked
Journal not within {tokenName}'s reach or is locked
foundryvtt-arms-reach.errorNoDsProperty: No 'ds' property found for value '${wallDataDs}' for id : '${wallDDataId}'
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintEnableA: Enable the GM to select the maximum distance that players can interact with a door
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintNotific: Emit notifications for when a player fails to interact with a door. Good for debugging.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameGlobalM: [Deprecated] Global maximum interaction distance in tiles
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintGlobalM: [Use instead 'Global maximum interaction distance measurement'], 0 will disable this setting limit (needs app reload). Max distance (in tiles) that a token can interact with a (door, journal, ...). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameGlobalM: Global maximum interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...), support Hex Grid,Gridless and Difficult Terain Ruler
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintGlobalM: Max distance (in feet, meter, or the default system unit grid you are using) that a token can interact with aplaceable object (door, journal, ...), 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintHotKeyF: Pressing 'e' will open or close nearest door. Holding 'e' will center camera on current token.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintDoubleT: Double tapping a move key on the direction of a door will interact with it. This option sets the delay between required key presses (the lower the faster you need to tap). Setting this option to zero will disable interaction with double tap.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintMaximum: [Use instead 'Maximum door interaction distance measurement'], 0 will disable this setting limit (needs app reload).
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameMaximum: Maximum door interaction distance measurement (ft, mt, ...), support Hex Grid,Gridless and Difficult Terain Ruler
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintMaximum: Maximum door interaction distance measurement (in feet, meter, or the default system unit grid you are using)
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintHotKeyT: Holding 'e' will center the camera on current selected token.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameNotific: Notifications failed interactions even for GM
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintNotific: Emit notifications for when a player fails to interact with a door. Good for debugging even for GM.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameAvoidSe: Avoid deselects the controlled token when open/close the door
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintAvoidSe: Avoid deselects the controlled token if opening the door with a mouse click and 'Left-Click to Release Objects' is checked in the Core
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingNameUseOwne: Use the owned tokens if no tokens is selected
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintUseOwne: Use the owned tokens if no tokens is selected, make sense for player when usually there is only owned token
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintSetDist: Set Distance Mode for Dorr distance interaction
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintShowDoo: Default behavior hides Door Icons on the Walls layer. This makes them stay visible.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintStairwa: Max distance that a token can interact with a stairway... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintGridles: Instead of calculate the distance by square grid unit, the calculation is based on the unit meele reach of the token 'ft' or 'mt'
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintResetDo: Add a voice on context menu for close all the dorrs and reset the fog on a scene
foundryvtt-arms-reach.settingHintJournal: Max distance that a token can interact with a journal... 0 will disable the limit (needs app reload). GM's ignore this distance limitation.
